spell.oreos_spells_addon.sanguine_ascens: Launch yourself skyward in a burst of hemomantic force. Cast again midair to slam into a chosen location, rupturing the ground with volatile blood magic upon impact.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.bloody_lance.gu: Conjure a lance forged from blood magic and hurl it with terrifying speed, piercing the air with violent force and leaving a crimson trail in its wake. On impact, it deals massive damage and restores 35% of the damage dealt as health.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.bloody_cleave.g: Empower your next melee strike with volatile blood magic, delivering a brutal cleave that siphons vitality from your target. Restores 15% of the damage dealt as health.
Condense a mass of volatile blood to a critical point, then unleash it in a focused, high-pressure stream. The blast deals heavy damage and pierces through all targets in its path.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.sacrificial_cle: Draw forth your tainted blood, purging afflictions at the cost of your own life. The pain sharpens your survival instinct—granting resistance and clarity as new blood takes its place.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.phantom_chrysal: Transcend the moment by casting your soul into the chrysalis. Should harm reach you, your essence flutters free, transformed and empowered.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.sanguine_pool.g: Become blood itself temporarily—invulnerable, untouchable, and unable to interact. Enemies damaged by the pool restore 5% of the damage dealt as health to you.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.thundering_slas: Wreathe your blade in a raging thunderstorm and cleave through enemies with a strike charged in lightning.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.cleave.guide: A flurry of slashes that divide reality, no matter the obstacle—the power to rend all things.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.thunderous_crow: Strike forward with a thunderous blade. Hit targets are marked with a Crown of Storms, summoning 8 lightning blades that orbit and damage them before converging in a final impalement and lightning strike.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.void_rupture.gu: Tear holes into the End to unleash blades from the Forlorn Ocean of Remains — the graveyard of the End — to sever your enemies and vanish, like the ghosts to whom they once belonged.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.dismantle.guide: Conceptualize a blade into reality — flying straight and true. Raw savagery given form: a pure and irrefutable end.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.boogie_woogie.g: Applause! Acclimation of the soul! Clap to control positioning: normal casts pull and stun foes or relocate allies, shift casts swap places or reposition them near others.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.frozen_blood.gu: Freeze the flow of blood—the highway of humanity—into a crystalline monument. Harden your body into unyielding stone, impervious to blade or flame. For a moment, become as diamond: untouchable, immovable, eternal.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.flowingredscale: Ignite your body temperature and spike your red blood cell count—enter a state of crimson overdrive. Greatly enhances blood spell power, movement speed, and attack damage. Grants a flat 5% lifesteal while active.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.thunder_clap_da: Dash forward as a bolt of lightning, instantly teleporting to your destination. If an enemy is struck, you instead teleport directly to them and detonate in a burst of electrical energy.
spell.oreos_spells_addon.flame_aura.guid: Sacrifice your own mana to ignite yourself in searing flames, scorching nearby foes, empowering your fire magic, hastening your mana recovery, and turning you into a blazing shield against fire—while stripping your enemies of their flame defenses.
